txt.en: The Summer Festival is upon us! It is time to enjoy the longest days of the year, the warmth of the sun, and the peak of the mid-year harvest.
Enjoy the summer festivities while they last
The Summer Festival has come to Middle-earth to spread its gaiety and warmth to each and every patron.
A merry, sunny summer has visited the good festival patrons, giving them perfect weather in which to enjoy the many festival games.
